html:
1.26.22  3:08 pm   how many songs have you written in minor key

      does it count if if explodes into a major key almost immediately and then stays there

1.26.22  2:14 pm   times new roman is coming roaring back into the mainstream as an ironic retro "default microsoft word aesthetic" font. will you persist

     with what

     or will you try and stay ahead of the curve for a few more years and switch to arial, calibri, dare I say roboto, apple san francisco? I've asked before and I need to know

      i haven't used times new roman in years, and i never used it very much at all. in videos i've been on exclusively arial for the past 2 years, and before that it was almost entirely helvetica (i actually don't notice the difference between those two). and the website is fontless. if you're seeing Times here, that would be on your end

1.26.22  1:45 pm   is the next song already done or are you still working on it?

      the song is done and i'm working on the video

1.26.22  12:44 pm   Hey question, i was in the mall then they close down the mall, do you have any idea of why?

      maybe all the stores decided individually to close

1.26.22  9:20 am   why do we use doors to enter buildings and not windows

      because gravity keeps us pressed against the floor. windows don't usually go down to the floor, but doors do. the word "door" is short for "down to the floor"

1.26.22  7:25 am   I've been attempting to write music for the better part of two years, and I have finished 13 songs. There is only one song of the 13 that I can look back on and actually think is decent. For the last few weeks, I've been trying to perfect this one song, but now I am starting to dislike it too. I've been putting loads of time and energy into music making, and nothing I make is any good. How do I make my music sound decent? Both lyrically and musically?

      it might be time for a little reverse psychology. try to make something bad on purpose. the results may surprise you

1.26.22  5:59 am   does the next song contain a circle

      yes

1.26.22  5:15 am   How to start animations?

      start by making every frame all black. if it's already all black, try making every frame all white

1.26.22  12:34 am   Tips on hearing/transcribing inner voices? All my digital playback trickery is failing me and I feel like I'm wasting my time, but sometimes I wanna know the exact voicing man.

      after you learn enough songs, it just happens, somewhere around the 10,000th song, you'll realize you have it. it's kind of like knowing how to spell "doubt". you can't actually hear the "b" but you've just been around long enough and you've seen that word in enough places that you just know what it is

1.26.22  12:02 am   hey are you a protagonist? 

      everyone is

      that's to uplift the sad topics and make them happier

      maybe on tuesday

      how about using the chewbacca defense

      you'll have to start making anger music

      1a

      there's no such thing as airplane food. so that must be something else they're serving

1.25.22  11:49 am   would you say that you're a risk taker?

      eventually

1.25.22  9:12 am   I try to write music but the types of music I enjoy are so diverse and nothing alike that I couldn't possibly use what I know about music from them to write a coherent song and so everything I make is just a worse version of whatever artist I'm listening to at the time what do i do

      keep living

1.25.22  7:38 am   how do you make videos?

      i don't really know yet

1.25.22  7:35 am   In History of the World, did it take a long time for you to figure out that you could turn the map to make Cuba look like Japan? That was so brilliant.

      as soon as i found out that columbus made that mistake, i knew i'd be able to execute it on the map

1.25.22  5:16 am   how long does it usually take to make a song?

      i haven't figured out the usual way yet

1.25.22  3:59 am   if you were to redo any of your old songs, which would you choose?

      that's unthinkable, because there are so many new ones to be done

1.25.22  1:38 am   what is your favorite video you have made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

1.25.22  12:54 am   have you ever done anything badder/worse than the thing you did do in the song just did a bad thing or was that the (worst) baddest thing youve ever done

      i've only done medium things

1.25.22  12:34 am   Do you think I can complete an album in 3 months?

     sure

      And not have it feel rushed? 

      yes. in the old days, albums were made in 1 day

1.24.22  11:19 pm   hi bill, this is kinda grim but i really am interested in this answer. has anyone ever told you their suicidal thoughts as a question?

     yes

      ok so that sounds bad but how do you go on without feeling guilty, or do you even feel guilty?

     i give the best answer i can, if i can. sometimes i skip. i don't feel guilty for that, because many of them i do answer

     because if it was me i wouldn't know how to respond, hell! i wouldn't even know if i SHOULD respond!? so how do you deal with all that pressure to formulate the right answers, and not just suicidal questions, like any question you get. how do you deal with everyone's expectations that you're  some wise old sage who knows it all?

     the best way around this, i've found, is to simultaneously pretend that i am and am not

     or do you know it all?

     everything is everything, so, even knowing just 1 thing, technically that would amount to knowing it all. but still there's everything else, which i don't know. and even that 1 bit of thing that i do know keeps changing, so then suddenly i don't know it

     maybe, or maybe not?? heck! maybe i know it all. ok, so maybe i don't, but who says you do too. ok wait, everyone thinks you know it all,

     that's not true

      and honestly i would agree, except i don't. know one really knows it all, there's no such thing. unless a god or a higher power exist, but even that itself might not be the case. well goodbye bill:)

1.24.22  11:03 pm   why hello bill, is the color blue going to be in the new video?

      yes, how did you know

1.24.22  10:56 pm   what to do when your anxiously waiting for something?

      find a second thing to wait for. by the time you find that second thing, the first thing will have arrived

1.24.22  10:03 pm   I want to try writing a jazz song and I have some stuff written out already but the issue is that it just doesn't sound very jazzy. It sounds interesting but it doesn't have that distinct jazz flavor. I'm not very far into the writing process do you think that i should just keep trying stuff until it eventually comes or should I start looking more into jazz theory type stuff to help or some combination of everything 

      jazz means like 20 different things now, so i'm not sure. to me it's a dank scrabble word

1.24.22  8:35 pm   how would you pronounce carribean: cur-rib-ean or care-ri-be-an?

      neither. instead, i tumble into a fit of indecision

1.24.22  5:57 pm   sometimes i worry that i'm not enough, any advice?

      that's normal. no one is enough

      love is self showing

      no

      1 black pixel

      i was going to say chicken but now i'm not so sure

      i will let you decide

      it likes me

      switching tricks

      everything is magicians

      you'll have to make better change

      because it was only a test/practice, and for some reason i didn't feel like i was at a point in my career where i should be uploading test/practices to youtube

      doing it now

      i have never driven a large vehicle

      i'm not sure
